title: Cucumber and Dill Salad
short_description:
Cucumber and Dill Salad is a crisp, hydrating, and fresh side dish, perfect for a light meal. It's simple to make and full of flavor. 
• 2 large cucumbers 
• 3 tablespoons fresh dill, chopped 
• 2 tablespoons white wine vinegar 
• 1 tablespoon olive oil 
• 1 teaspoon sugar 
• Salt and pepper to taste

steps.title: Slice Cucumbers
steps.description: Thinly slice the cucumbers and place them in a large bowl.

steps.title: Mix Dressing
steps.description: In a small bowl, combine white wine vinegar, olive oil, sugar, salt, and pepper. Stir well to create the dressing.

steps.title: Combine and Chill
steps.description: Pour the dressing over the cucumbers and toss to coat. Add the chopped dill and mix again. Refrigerate for a few minutes before serving.
